text.15_Chapter, 48_Verse: Look - this was the debt of Sodom your sister: pride, plenty of bread, and ease and tranquility were hers and her villages, yet the hand of the poor and hungry she did not strengthen.
text.15_Chapter, 49_Verse: And they claimed themselves superior, and did an abomination before Me, so I exiled them, just as has been revealed from before Me.
